update t_pec_capital_template
f_version = #{version,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_capital_type = #{capitalType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_capital_code = #{capitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_match_target_code = #{matchTargetCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_match_target_rank_level = #{matchTargetRankLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_repayment_formula_no = #{repaymentFormulaNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_repayment_formula_name = #{repaymentFormulaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_clearing_formula_no = #{clearingFormulaNo,jdbcType=CHAR},

f_is_support_accelerate = #{isSupportAccelerate,jdbcType=CHAR},

f_fee_template_no = #{feeTemplateNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_fee_code = #{feeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_operater_name = #{operaterName,jdbcType=CHAR},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
